alert.note: Alert for Adair; Delaware (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 1:04PM CST until December 19 at 4:45AM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Illinois River near Watts affecting Adair and Delaware Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Illinois River near Watts. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, moderate flooding occurs from the Arkansas border to Fidler`s Bend. Farmlands and permanent campgrounds are affected. A few cabins in the Fidler`s Bend area may have minor flooding. Extreme turbulence makes the river too hazardous for floating. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:30 PM CST Saturday the stage was 16.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this evening and continue falling and remain below flood stage. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
